name: Compendium Filters
description: Adds a screen check on the current card pool during a run and a filtering menu for this screen and the card library filters. Also serves as a utility library for rendering objects and creating GUI elements.
credits:
Adapts code from https://github.com/EatYourBeetS/STS-AnimatorMod, https://github.com/SrJohnathan/gdx-effekseer. 
 DLL libraries: https://github.com/effekseer/EffekseerForMultiLanguages 
 Shaders: Landon Manning
